title: Peep-show, "Peep-show Section: A Coff", ca. 1750
medium:
Hand-colored etching, with engraving
Support: white laid paper laid down on thick gray paper
inscribed: inscribed in plate, lower margin: C.P. Maj. K M. Eng. exc. A.V.; in pen and black ink, lower center: 6; in pen and brown ink, verso: 6
dimensions:
15 x 9.6 cm (5 7/8 x 3 3/4 in.)
dims. vary slightly
creditline: Gift of Mrs. James Ward Thorne

tombstone.epitaph:
Peep-show, "Peep-show Section: A Coff", ca. 1750.
